items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Faux Wrap dress
items.body: I love this dress!!! It fits in all the right places, classy yet comfortable, lightweight but full coverage. I was worried about the wrap at the bodice but it has plenty of coverage for me at church, it doesn’t gape open like a lot of wrap dresses I have had in the past, it hugs your curves perfectly. I bought two already, the black and brown animal print, can’t remember the exact name of the print, but I’m looking to buy a couple more in different colors. GIT YA ONE OR THREE!!! lol Read more
items.author: Trudy A. Mann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love It!
items.body: I absolutely love this Berydress Faux Wrap Dress! I always get so many compliments whenever I wear it. At 5'1", I find it super short-girl friendly, which is a huge plus. It is true to size, has stretch in it, and is lightweight. It's a great quality as well. The fit is flattering and comfortable, and the style works perfectly for both casual outings and dressier occasions. I loved it so much that I purchased it in both black and army green. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kristi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A casual jersey knit material.
items.body: This dress is very pretty and well made. However, it is a jersey knit t-shirt material. Not dressy more for cute comfort. I would maybe wear it to church, but wasn't dressy enough for my event. Fit exactly as expected. Read more
items.author: a costello

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and flattering!
items.body: Fits true to size, nice soft cotton material, washed and dried easily, color is as shown, can be dressed up or down, fit is very flattering! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars fabric was disappointing.
items.body: This dress fit great, was stylish and comfy. However, as many reviews state, the fabric is more like a stretch tee shirt and just was not quality enough for my event. It may be okay as a day dress, but not for evening cocktail. The Amazon Essentials wrap dress, was half the cost and 5 times the quality! Read more
items.author: P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: This dress is well made and very flattering on. The layers inside bow hide the stomach. It is a very unusual color though, almost pink. Not your typical beige and black leopard. Great length, just below the kneecap. Looks wonderful with boots and a black jacket. Read more
items.author: Catherine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress at a reasonable price
items.body: I’m 5’1” 145-148lbs and I purchased a large and it fits perfect! Material is not heavy and not light it’s just right. Beautiful pattern. I exercise daily and my legs are muscular and don’t like my cloths skin tight so the large worked for me Read more
items.author: denise d.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!! Super flattering!
items.body: This is a great dress! I have it in 3 colors! It’s decent quality, and it’s stretchy so it fits perfectly. It’s very flattering around the mid section, and you can dress it up or down. It’s a medium weight fabric. It does not have pockets, but I think that the pockets would add bulk and make the dress look awkward. It’s the perfect dress! Read more
items.author: Rebecca

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Black Polka Dot, Army Green, Black, White Floral, Brown Leopard, Dark Green, Red, Iris, Blue Leopard, Navy, Deep Blue, Blue Floral, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
